data.actual_result: The box stays where the role originally was
data.expected_result: The box updates to where the role goes
data.short_description: When rearranging roles, and changing their position, the box where it will go doesn't update like on the app [Firefox]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on Firefox - Go to a server -> server settings -> roles -  Create a few roles - Start re-arranging them
